vote.title: Authorize (1) an agreement with the Texas Department of Transportation  (TxDOT) through a grant from the U.S. Department of Transportation Federal Highway Administration for the 2020 Highway Safety Improvement Program in the amount of $459,468.06 to provide cost reimbursement for material and labor incurred by the City related to the construction of traffic signal improvements at the following intersections: Audelia Road at Church Road, Ferguson Road at Woodmeadow Parkway, Zang Boulevard at Jefferson Boulevard, Hampton Road at Bickers Street, and Mockingbird Lane at Forest Park Road (Agreement No. CSJ 0918-47-342, etc., CFDA No. 20.205); (2) the establishment of appropriations in the amount of $459,468.06 in the TxDOT HSIP - Five Signals - May 2023 Fund; (3) the receipt and deposit of funds in the amount of $459,468.06 in the TxDOT HSIP - Five Signals - May 2023 Fund; and (4) the disbursement of funds in the amount of $459,468.06 from the TxDOT HSIP - Five Signals - May 2023 Fund - Total amount of $459,468.06 - Financing: Texas Department of Transportation Grant Funds
vote.description: Authorize (1) an agreement with the Texas Department of Transportation  (TxDOT) through a grant from the U.S. Department of Transportation Federal Highway Administration for the 2020 Highway Safety Improvement Program in the amount of $459,468.06 to provide cost reimbursement for material and labor incurred by the City related to the construction of traffic signal improvements at the following intersections: Audelia Road at Church Road, Ferguson Road at Woodmeadow Parkway, Zang Boulevard at Jefferson Boulevard, Hampton Road at Bickers Street, and Mockingbird Lane at Forest Park Road (Agreement No. CSJ 0918-47-342, etc., CFDA No. 20.205); (2) the establishment of appropriations in the amount of $459,468.06 in the TxDOT HSIP - Five Signals - May 2023 Fund; (3) the receipt and deposit of funds in the amount of $459,468.06 in the TxDOT HSIP - Five Signals - May 2023 Fund; and (4) the disbursement of funds in the amount of $459,468.06 from the TxDOT HSIP - Five Signals - May 2023 Fund - Total amount of $459,468.06 - Financing: Texas Department of Transportation Grant Funds
